body:
Its my 15th Birthday :DD:D::D
Whats your best birthday memory/present ever??
body_tagged:

title: Itz my birthday YAY!!!

replies.body: Happy Birthday! Try to make this post include others like asking "When's your birthday" as well. :)
replies.body_tagged: Happy Birthday! Try to make this post include others like asking "When's your birthday" as well. :)

replies.body: HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!! My best memory was of course my first and only Birthday party when I was young, and my best present ever is Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!! My best memory was of course my first and only Birthday party when I was young, and my best present ever is Minecraft.

replies.body: Happy Birthday! My best birthday was when i was 3,and my best birthday present was a new-ultra PC gaming *u*

replies.body: Happy freaking birthday man. To many more! :) The best birthday gift I've received was an iPhone 5s. :D

replies.body: Happy Birthday! I got a bike.
replies.body_tagged: Happy Birthday! I got a bike.

replies.body:
Happy Birthday!! Big 1 5 whoop whoop!


My Favourite birthday moment?

I was 12 and had just come back home from a 5 day camp.
I got home and my family gave me a brand new electric guitar with a 15 watt amp.
It was so awesome!

replies.body: Happy Birthday man, hope you have a good day!
